net.proteusframework.data.filesystem

Class SearchAndReplace

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.automation.AbstractTask
      • net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.SearchAndReplace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Task

    public class SearchAndReplace
extends AbstractTask
    Utility to search and replace content in filesystem entities. Only operates on text content. Uses the regular expression support in the JDK, see Pattern.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchAndReplace

        public SearchAndReplace(String identifier,
                String description,
                int version,
                boolean requiresDowntime,
                Set<DataConversion> dependencies,
                String search,
                String replace)
        Create a new instance.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier.
        description - the description.
        version - the version.
        requiresDowntime - true if the conversion requires downtime. This indicates that it cannot be run while the server is running.
        dependencies - any dependencies.
        search - the search string, a regular expression, see Pattern.
        replace - the replace string, may contain regular expression references, see Pattern.
